errors.message: CBC detected the model has no feasible solution
errors.cause: Constraints or bounds cannot be satisfied simultaneously

solutions.approach: Check presolve output for conflicting rows
solutions.when: Need to see which constraints cause infeasibility

solutions.code: cbc model.lp branch printingOptions all firstfeasible

errors.cause: Missing bounds on variables or objective direction inconsistent

solutions.approach: Add sensible bounds to decision variables
solutions.when: Variables currently free in objective direction
Presolve can detect unbounded rays earlier

solutions.approach: Switch objective sense or add penalties
solutions.when: Objective should be bounded by design

errors.message: Solver stopped due to time limit before optimality proof
errors.cause: Search space is large relative to allowed time

solutions.approach: Increase time limit or node limit
Warm start with a heuristic solution

errors.message: Numerical issues encountered in LP relaxation
errors.cause: Poorly scaled coefficients or nearly dependent constraints

solutions.code: % express costs in thousands instead of units

solutions.when: Default tolerances too loose for dataset

solutions.code: % eliminate linear dependencies before exporting LP
solutions.when: Singular matrix arises from redundant rows

errors.message: CBC failed to read input or write solution
errors.cause: Wrong working directory or missing LP/MPS file
